document_data.caption: A map of Malatra, showing the Himasla Mountains in the south.
document_data.name: Himasla Mountains
document_data.mainbody:
The '''Himasla Mountains''' were a mountain range in [[Malatra]] in southern [[Kara-Tur]]. They marked the southernmost limit of the [[Kuong Kingdom]] and separated Malatra from the western and southern lands.

The mountain range was rugged and quite poorly explored, and emerged out of the densest jungle in all Malatra.

Nevertheless, a [[Trade road (Kuong Kingdom)|trade road]] ran through its foothills. In the midâ€“14{{th}} century [[DR]], this was guarded by the Kuong fortress-town of [[Garuji]], whose garrison patrolled the road and fought with the [[Tigbanua buso|buso]] of the mountains.
